name: Giannis(Not_so_much)Adventures
description:
Hello!!
This is Giannis. Giannis lives in a non rotating planet. In a Galaxy far far away...
Once inhabited by humans but not anymore.
On this planet there are now two dominant species...Vampires and Werewolfs.
After millennial of war between them they finally reach a peaceful
coexistence. The areas of the planet that are neither day
nor night are inhabited by both species.

 The called those areas the 'Peace and Friendship' zones.
 Biological experiments for creating a hubrid species were initiated.

Giannis is the first successful 'product' of those experiments.
